welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Vienne, France! Get ready to fall in love with the charming streets, rich history, and delicious cuisine of this beautiful city. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Vienne has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bron Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bron Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at St-Exupéry Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Grenoble-isere Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Grenoble-isere Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boutheon Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
